text:
Battery Park: A northward view from the Sea Wall showing citizens enjoying a respite from the summer heat. Undergoing reconstruction is the Washington Bldg. (No. 1 Broadway). Beyond same is the Woolworth Bldg. silhouette with the Equitable roof and the Bankers Trust pyramid opposite. The latter is overshadowing the Standard Oil Buildings and the U.S. Custom House.

About 1915

Ewing Galloway
title: Manhattan: Battery Park.
